import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import matter from 'gray-matter' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Hnav from '../components/hnav' import Hfooter from '../components/hfooter' import './blog.css' const Blogs = () => { const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]) const [categoryFilter, setCategoryFilter] = useState(null) const [tagFilter, setTagFilter] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const loadPosts = async () => { const files = [ 'post1.md', 'post2.md', 'post3.md' // replace with your actual .md filenames ] const loadedPosts = await Promise.all( files.map(async (file) => { const res = await fetch(`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/posts/${file}`) const text = await res.text() const { data } = matter(text) return { ...data, slug: file.replace('.md', '') } }) ) setPosts(loadedPosts) } loadPosts() }, []) const filteredPosts = posts .filter((post) => { if (categoryFilter && post.category !== categoryFilter) return false if (tagFilter && !post.tags?.includes(tagFilter)) return false return true }) .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.date) - new Date(a.date)) const categories = [...new Set(posts.map((p) => p.category))] const tags = [...new Set(posts.flatMap((p) => p.tags || []))] return (
Blogs - Dawit Teklebrhan
blogs
home / blog
{filteredPosts.map((post) => (

{post.title}

{new Date(post.date).toLocaleDateString()}

Category: {post.category}

Tags: {post.tags?.join(', ')}

))}
Latest Posts
    {posts.slice(0, 3).map((post) => (
  • {post.title}
    {new Date(post.date).toLocaleDateString()}
    • ))}
Categories
    {categories.map((cat) => (
    • ))}
Tags
{tags.map((tag) => ( ))}
) } export default Blogs
